title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME RELATING TO TURBINES
GAS TURBINES

note.note-paragraph: This subclass constitutes an internal scheme for indexing only, associated with subclasses F01D, F01K, F02C and F02K, relating to turbines and gas turbines

title-part.text: Indexing scheme associated with former IdT class <ref scheme="idt">46F
Turbines
Gas turbines
Turbines with combustion chamber whose inlet and outlet open and close periodically
Explosion turbines
Methods for improving the efficiency, special cycles, refrigeration by means of turbines, gas turbine plants with heat pumps
, indirect heating by circulation of an auxiliary fluid

reference.text: gas turbine plants comprising separators for ashes consisting of matters put in circulation and being used at the same time for heat transfer R02C746/00F30N

title-part.text: using combustion gas, gas turbines functioning by means of exhaust gas
using magnetohydrodynamic generators

Turbines with special provisions for the compression of fuel gas or of its components, plants in which the compressor and the turbine form a unit, groups of compression of charge or complement for gas turbine cycles, compression by shock waves

reference.text: burners with pulsatory combustion R02C746/00F1, R02C746/00F30N6

title-part.text: Compression in the rotor for the turbine blades, turbines also functioning as compressor, cell compressors

Turbines using a single driven special gas, use of catalysts, use of oxyhydric gas or detonating gas, use of air or liquid oxygen, using of gas generating cartridges, use of compressed air tanks, air turbines, provisions for preventing the formation of snow or frost in the turbine, turbines for hand-held tools
Turbines using mixtures of gas and steam as driving medium, also if the gas and steam currents only mix after the turbine, water injection
Turbines using an auxiliary liquid
the auxiliary liquid making a to-and-fro movement
the auxiliary liquid being circulated in a close circuit
Turbines using several gases or steams with separate action
Turbines other than those according to groups R02C746/00F1 to R02C746/00F15, counter-rotating turbines
Turbines using fluid friction
Special kinds of reaction turbines
Turbines with blades having channels passing through the rotor
Explosion turbines, i.e. internal combustion
Turbines with saw-tooth or ratchet-wheel shaped rotor
Propeller and similar turbines driven by reaction, e.g. fluids issuing from the rotor
Turbines with radial entry

reference.text: gas turbines driven by exhaust gas R02C746/00F5A

title-part.text: Cooling
Cooling of gas
Cooling of oil
Components and control
Inversion of rotation
Turbines with forward and reverse rotation
Blades and blade carrying members
Turbine rotors, e.g. multistage
Assembly
Shafts
Safety and control devices
Test benches
Starting devices, e.g. quick-starting devices
using starting cartridges
Elements specifically intended for combustion turbines, pulverulent and solid fuel turbines
Separation of ashes
Fuel supply and feeding devices, e.g. pre-processing of fuel, pumps, valves, draining of the fuel system
Combustion chambers with admission valves, control, scavenging and filling
Plants with specific use of turbines
Construction of power stations with gas turbines
Plants comprising a turbine of a special kind, plants with cellular wheel
Grouping of the various parts of a plant
Turbo-compressor plants for providing compressed air or gases, hot gases or steam, control of these palnts
Propulsion plants, e.g. marine turbines
Turbine plants for gas-turbine locomotives
Control of the gas turbines in propulsion plants, e.g. for ships or turbo-propulsion

reference.text: control of gas turbines in general R02C746/00F30, control of fuel supply R02C746/00F45 to R02C746/00F48

title-part.text: Gas turbine plants for marine propulsion
Turbines supplied by other gas generators than those consisting in a combination of combustion chambers and axial or centrifugal compressors
Turbines supplied by piston gas generators
Plants consisting of pistons gas generators, e.g. with free pistons bringing a driving gas to separately assembled turbines, control of such plants
Plants consisting of a piston gas generator forming a unit with a turbine
Turbines supplied by other gas generators than those according to group R02C746/00F40D1
Control systems for the fuel supply to the combustors of gas turbines plants
